meanings.definition: manifestations of a deity to a person
meanings.sent1: The theophanies in ancient stories often brought comfort to those who witnessed them.
meanings.sent2: The theophanies described in mythology were powerful and awe-inspiring.
meanings.sent3: The theophanies decided to appear in the form of a gentle breeze, making everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The theophanies of nature's beauty can be seen in the blooming flowers and majestic mountains.
meanings.sent5: The theophanies of the divine were etched in the minds of those who experienced them.

meanings.definition: appearances of a god or gods to humans
meanings.sent1: The theophanies of ancient gods were often depicted in art and stories.
meanings.sent2: The theophanies of Zeus were said to be grand and magnificent.
meanings.sent3: The theophanies decided to show up at the party, surprising everyone with their presence.
meanings.sent4: The theophanies of wisdom and knowledge can guide us through difficult times.
meanings.sent5: The theophanies of the divine beings left a lasting impact on those who witnessed them.
